title: BL Santhosh Hints at Rejig in K’taka BJP Leadership Ahead of Amit Shah’s Visit; State Unit Jittery - News18
content: BL Santhosh Hints at Rejig in K’taka BJP Leadership Ahead of Amit Shah’s Visit; State Unit Jittery  News18View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Karnataka BJP leadership has been busy trying to downplay the statement by BL Santhosh. “We will give tickets to people who can win, we will drop weak candidates. This has been the yardstick for a long time, there is no reason to give it a different meaning,” said CT Ravi, BJP national general secretary.
